name: Dopamine (itch) (Chromatic Window, Nobongo)
description:
Test your luck, beat the house, and get rich all with a flick of the wrist! *

Dopamine is a simple gambling game, perfect for a relaxing little break from the pressures of the real world. 

 Rake in immense amounts of tokens and drain the house dry! **

How To Play:

Click the "Bet" button to add coins to your bet!

Click and hold the "Roll" button to bring in your dice, then flick your mouse across the table and release to send em flying!

Roll higher than the house to win!

* The Casino cannot be held responsible for any events of bankruptcy.

** Forfeiture of personal effects is required to fulfill any outstanding debts.
